value.original: Link Column
Link Column for Multi-Parent tables
The Link Column indicates which column is the primary key for those situations where there is more than one parent. Only define it, if the table has more than one parent column (e.g. AD_User_Roles).

row.value: La Colonna Primaria indica qual'è la colonna che è la chiave primaria per quelle situazioni in cui c'è più di una chiave.

value.original: Language for this Business Partner if Multi-Language enabled

row.value: Linguaggio per il Business Partner se è abilitato il multi-lingua

value.original: The Language identifies the language to use for display and formatting documents. It requires, that on Client level, Multi-Lingual documents are selected and that you have created/loaded the language.

row.value: The Language identifies the language to use for display and formatting documents. It requires, that on Client level, Multi-Lingual documents are selected and that you have created/loaded the language.

value.original: Start Node
Workflow Node, step or process
The Workflow Node indicates a unique step or process in a Workflow.

row.value: The Workflow Node indicates a unique step or process in a Workflow.

value.original: Tax Amount
Tax Amount for Credit Card transaction

row.value: Importo dell'imposta per un'operazione con carta di credito

value.original: The Tax Amount displays the total tax amount. The tax amount is only used for credit card processing.

row.value: L'Importo dell'Imposta mostra l'importo totale dell'imposta. L'importo dell'imposta è utilizzato solamente per le transazioni con carta di credito

value.original: Only Currency
Restrict accepting only this currency
The Only Currency field indicates that this bank account accepts only the currency identified here.

row.value: Il campo Soltanto questa Valuta indica che questo conto bancario accetta solo la valuta qui specificata

value.original: Business Partner / Sales Rep
Identifies a Business Partner (Sales Rep) receiving the Commission

row.value: Identifica un Business Partner (rappresentante) per la ricezione dei provvigioni

value.original: The Business Partner should be a vendor and may be a Sales Representative

row.value: Il Business Partner/Agente dovrebbe essere un fornitore e può essere un rappresentante di vendita

value.original: System Notice acknowledged
The Acknowledged checkbox indicates if this notice does not need to be retained.

row.value: Il flag Riconoscere indica se questa avviso non deve essere conservata

value.original: Driving Column
Column which controls all tabs in the workbench

row.value: Colonna che controlla tutti i tabs nel banco di lavoro

value.original: System Name
Name your Compiere System installation, e.g. Joe Block, Inc.

row.value: Name your Compiere System installation, e.g. Joe Block, Inc.

value.original: The name if the system to differentiate support contracts

row.value: The name if the system to differentiate support contracts

value.original: Attribute Set Instance
Product Attribute Values
The values of the actual Product Attributes. Product Instance attributes are defined in the actual transactions.

row.value: The values of the actual Product Attributes. Product Instance attributes are defined in the actual transactions.

value.original: Document No
Document sequence number of the document

row.value: Document sequence number of the document

value.original:
The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>".
If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field is empty if you create a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).

row.value:
The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>".
If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field is empty if you create a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).

value.original: Condition Value
Overwrite Project
Overwrite the account segment Project with the value specified
If not overwritten, the value of the original account combination is used. If selected, but not specified, the segment is set to null.
Attribute Set Instance
Product Attribute Values
The values of the actual Product Attributes. Product Instance attributes are defined in the actual transactions.

row.value: The values of the actual Product Attributes. Product Instance attributes are defined in the actual transactions.

value.original: Language for this Business Partner if Multi-Language enabled

row.value: Language for this Business Partner if Multi-Language enabled

value.original: The Language identifies the language to use for display and formatting documents. It requires, that on Client level, Multi-Lingual documents are selected and that you have created/loaded the language.

row.value: The Language identifies the language to use for display and formatting documents. It requires, that on Client level, Multi-Lingual documents are selected and that you have created/loaded the language.
